title: Vegetable Cornish pasties
ingredients: ['1 recipe wholemeal pastry (or shop bought)', '60g butter', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 carrot, thinly sliced', '1 swede, peeled and diced', '1 large potato, peeled and diced', '125g mushrooms, chopped', '2 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon Marmite', '60ml milk', '1 egg', '125g grated Cheddar cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 egg, beaten']
